# Supported networks & dispatcher contracts

Here you'll find an overview of the networks Polymer currently supports and where to find the address of the Dispatcher contract.

## Supported networks (testnet)

This table gives an overview of the important information for the networks Polymer supports currently. Note that when using IBC app in Solidity template to build apps, these are pre-populated in the environment file [here](https://github.com/open-ibc/ibc-app-solidity-template/blob/main/.env.example).

### Mainnet 
| Network                  | vIBC dispatcher | UC middleware |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| [OP Mainnet](https://docs.optimism.io/chain/networks#op-mainnet)    | [0x7b456332e91Edf68B7d5E517085D5b15F9133fb8](https://optimism-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0x7b456332e91Edf68B7d5E517085D5b15F9133fb8) | [0x0d3ed2B0A69a55519Ac249554aA58c5aD08E3174](https://optimism-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0x0d3ed2B0A69a55519Ac249554aA58c5aD08E3174) |
| [Base Mainnet](https://docs.base.org/network-information#base-mainnet)      | [0x7b456332e91Edf68B7d5E517085D5b15F9133fb8](https://base-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0x7b456332e91Edf68B7d5E517085D5b15F9133fb8)              | [0x0d3ed2B0A69a55519Ac249554aA58c5aD08E3174](https://base-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0x0d3ed2B0A69a55519Ac249554aA58c5aD08E3174) |


### Testnet
| Network                  | vIBC dispatcher | UC middleware |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| [OP Sepolia](https://docs.optimism.io/chain/networks#op-sepolia) | [Blockscout](https://optimism-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0xA8887C2689F1cE60081A9F37537483dD66fe2e1a) | [Blockscout](https://optimism-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0x39D6b9b57eCa2323f1c7386541767C43fA70bB83) |
| [Base Sepolia](https://docs.base.org/network-information#base-testnet-sepolia) | [Blockscout](https://base-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0xD46875efF3fEa2c9c9A310f53d74E7BdF411f672)              | [Blockscout](https://base-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0x5FBf9a7F147B0Ae7D11DA9dE741f6b10dF06e9F8) |

## Network information

Below you find a useful quick overview to add network information to your wallet etc. The information is fetched from the [Polymer chain registry](https://github.com/polymerdao/polymer-registry). For more instructions visit the official docs for each network...
